text: Ghibli may refer to: *Studio Ghibli, a Japanese animation studio *Ghibli (wind), the hot Saharan wind of Libya *Ghibli, an AMX International AMX fighter aircraft *Ghibli, an ultralight disc wheelset made by Italian bicycle parts manufacturer Campagnolo *Ghibli, the radio callsign for the Italian airline Wind Jet * Caproni Ca.309 Ghibli, a World War II-era aeroplane *Maserati Ghibli, a model of car made by Italian auto manufacturer Maserati
title: Ghibli
